personal.name: Yacine Badiss
personal.description:
Software is my tool, happiness is my goal.
I write and build at a very inconsistent pace, inspired by friends and family.
I love facemasks, football, singing, every kind of games, movies that leave a mark, and genuine people.

projects.title: RecipIt
projects.description: Simple app to extract recipes from urls, in a format that is perfect for me, and hopefully for you too. Great if you're tired of ads and long youtube recipes.

projects.title: Facet
projects.description: A 3D interactive image tiler vibe-coded for my nephew. Features a grid of blocks with varying heights, custom textures, and smooth camera interactions.
